item.description:
Hi! I want to share my excitement about an amazing body of work I have recently discovered! 

 

I am so impressed with and inspired by this work that I want everyone to have a chance to experience it! So I have decided to offer a FREE INTRO on Sat, Feb 25, 3-5:30pm.

 

Healthy Attachment Re-Patterning (HARP) provides 'corrective experiences' in the relational field for adults who (like most of us!) experienced attachment disruption with our primary caregivers as children. This means that through this process we are able to strengthen our Secure Attachment System NOW, resulting in more connected and joyful adult relationships!

 

At the Intro you will be introduced to what HARP is and how it works, both theoretically and experientially. It is helpful to understand how the nervous system works and why we use the interventions we do in order to train the nervous system and attachment system to come back into optimal functioning. This will all be explained clearly and simply.

 

You will then be guided in a group exercise to get a sample taste of the work in your own experience. There’s nothing like experiencing something to gain an understanding from the inside out!

 

Finally, you will get to watch a live demo session to see it in action! One of the most engaging parts of my training was watching the demos. It’s amazing to witness the transformation before your eyes.

 

I will be asking for one volunteer for the demo. If you are interested, please indicate so when you register.

 

There will be time for Q&A as well!

 

I hope you will join me for this informative and potentially transformative afternoon!

 

With blessings for a contented and joyful heart,

Brynn Bishop

 

PS - An optional donation of $5 will be collected to help offset rental space fees.
item.name: FREE INTRO to Healthy Attachment Re-Patterning (HARP)
